name: Improved Drow Nobility
prerequisiteFormula: all(@cha_score >= 13, @feat:drow_nobility, "Able to use drow spell-like abilities", @race:drow)

description.text: Your magical heritage is more potent than that of your peers, as demonstrated by your superior spell-like abilities.

sections.Benefit: You may use your dancing lights, faerie fire, feather fall, and levitate spell-like abilities twice per day. Your darkness spell-like ability instead becomes deeper darkness, which you may use twice per day.
